text: Evergreen Park is a village in Cook County, Illinois, United States. It is a suburb of Chicago. The population was 19,943 at the 2020 census. Serial killer Theodore Kaczynski was born here in 1942 and Playboy model Jenny McCarthy was also born here in 1972. ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
title: Evergreen Park, Illinois
